label: Codegrasp
overview: All your coding knowledge, brought together to a single website.

label: Agam's Meme Generator
overview: A simple Meme generator that fetches a random meme from the r/memes subreddit.

label: Word Counter
overview: Counts the amount of words and characters in a phrase or text sample. Pretty useful for essays!

label: Agam's Weight Converter
overview: Convert a given weight from Kilos to Pounds and vice versa.

label: Score Average Calculator
overview: Will calculate your score average given grades as input.

label: Background Gradient Generator
overview: Generate a simple gradient based on inputs you give to the web page.

label: Agam's Password Generator
overview: A simple website that generates a random password that includes numbers, letters and symbols.
